item.title: markdown cheatsheet
item.description: Heading 1 Markup : # Heading 1 # -OR- Markup : ============= (below H1 text) Heading 2 Markup : ## Heading 2 ## -OR- Markup: ————— (below H2 text) Heading 3 Markup : ### Heading 3 ### Heading 4 Markup : #### Heading 4 #### Common text Markup : Common text Emphasized text Markup : Emphasized text or Emphasized text Strikethrough text Markup : Strikethrough text Strong text Markup : Strong text or Strong text
